snippet: Tokyo 2020 organizers unveiled on Wednesday a budget of $16.8 billion for hosting the next Summer Games and vowed to seek further savings in co-operation with the International Olympic Committee (IOC) which has been calling for them to cut costs....
lead_paragraph: Tokyo 2020 organizers unveiled on Wednesday a budget of $16.8 billion for hosting the next Summer Games and vowed to seek further savings in co-operation with the International Olympic Committee (IOC) which has been calling for them to cut costs.

headline.main: Tokyo Olympics Unveils $16.8 Billion Budget, to Seek More Savings
headline.print_headline: Tokyo Olympics Unveils $16.8 Billion Budget, to Seek More Savings
